thread.title: T.I. Said That He Wouldn't Vote For a Female President
thread.title_full: T.I. Said That He Wouldn't Vote For a Female President | Maxim

author: Kelly McClure
title: T.I. Said That He Wouldn't Vote For a Female President
text:
During a radio interview for DJ Whoo Kid's show to promote his surprise EP Da’ Nic , rapper and political news correspondent (LOL) T.I. became inflicted with a bad case of mouth runs and let slip that he could never vote a woman into the Oval Office because they make rash decisions emotionally. DJ Whoo, in full support, kept the topic afloat by repeatedly calling Clinton a "giant vagina."
T.I has since apologized for his (emotionally) rash remark.
My comments about women running for president were unequivocally insensitive and wrong. I sincerely apologize to everyone I offended.
— T.I. (@Tip) October 13, 2015
